Title: From the Hip
Writer: Bob Clark, David E. Kelley (screenplay), David E. Kelley (story)
Actors: Judd Nelson, Elizabeth Perkins, John Hurt, Darren McGavin
Plot: Apprentice lawyer Robin Weathers turns a civil suit into a headline grabbing charade. He must re-examine his scruples after his shenanigans win him a promotion in his firm, and he must now defend a college professor who is apparently guilty of murder.
